strings.string: This is just a test of the Connect IQ notification system.

This notification was sent from the background app. This message is longer to show that notifications can be scrolled. Notifications were added to Connect IQ in API 5.1.0. As seen with this message, the Notifications API can be used by an app running in the background. If the user selects an action from the notification the app will be started and notified which action was taken.
Press select or trigger a background temporal event to send a notification
Notification option 1 was selected by the user
Notification option 2 was selected by the user
Notification option 3 was selected by the user
Notification option 4 was selected by the user
